snippet: Mayor Cory Booker of Newark criticized the Devils' owner, Jeff Vanderbeek, for wringing more money out of the city after an arbitrator ruled for the Devils in a revenue dispute.
abstract: Mayor Cory Booker of Newark criticized the Devils' owner, Jeff Vanderbeek, for wringing more money out of the city after an arbitrator ruled for the Devils in a revenue dispute.

headline.main: Newark Mayor Blasts Devils Owner After Arbitration Ruling
headline.print_headline: Upset by Costly Ruling, Mayor Chides Devils’ Owner
